subject: Procedure for referring the Arbitral Award to the Court of Law.

Sub: Procedure for referring the Arbitral Award to the Court of Law. The procedure for referring the decisione of Dispute Review Expert {DREMDiaptte Revtew Board (DRB) to Arbitration is contained in Policy Circular No.99/2005, according to which a Committee will review the decisions and Tecommend whether the decisions of the DREJDRB is acceptable on merits  On the basis of the recommendations of the Committee, further action for  referring to Arbitration will be taken; In continuation of the above decision, it has now been decided that the award of the Arbitration Tribunal may also be refered t0 the same Committee for review before challenging the award in a Court of Law. In case, the Committee feels that the Arbitral Award is acceptable based on its merits, the same will be agreed by NHAI without challenging in the Court: All concemed may please note for information and strict compliance. This issues with the approval of the Chaiman; ML (GP, Chand) General Manager (Admn:) To: 1. PS to Chainan 2 All Members CGMs ICVO 3 AIl GMs at Hqs. 4 Librarian Hindi Ofiicer to: 1 . AIl PIUs !
